thread.title: Just what we wanted
thread.title_full: Just what we wanted - Review of Hotel des 3 Poussins, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Charlie H
title: Just what we wanted
text: We stayed for two nights over New Year. This hotel is in a great location, one minute walk from Saint-Georges metro and very close to local caf√©s, shops and restaurants. Our room was small, but we didn't spend much time there so it wasn't really an issue. The staff were friendly and helpful.
